message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it presents a great value at this price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm looking to pay closer to $12,500.  What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While that price doesn't quite work for me, I'm willing to come down a bit to $13,500. This is a fair offer considering the value this product brings.
